bloated.translation[0].definitions[0].de: full of liquid, gas, food etc, so that you look or feel much larger than normal
bloated.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I feel really bloated after that meal.
bloated.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you describe an organization as bloated, you mean that it is too big and does not work effectively
